plot: An Argentinian adaptation of the American game show "20Q," which aired on GSN in 2009. Human contestants play against a computer in order to win up to 100,000 pesos.
plot_en: An Argentinian adaptation of the American game show "20Q," which aired on GSN in 2009. Human contestants play against a computer in order to win up to 100,000 pesos.
plot_es: An Argentinian adaptation of the American game show "20Q," which aired on GSN in 2009. Human contestants play against a computer in order to win up to 100,000 pesos.
title: Flor de Palabra
